title: White chocolate tray bake cake
ingredients: ['250g golden caster sugar', '250g margarine', '4 eggs', '150ml natural yoghurt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '200g white chocolate, finely chopped', '300g self-raising flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '4 tablespoons full fat milk', '300g cream cheese, at room temperature', '100g icing sugar', 'white chocolate buttons, to decorate']
